slider.title: Start with trust
slider.text: To deliver in time, we built on the trust we gained in 5 years of teamwork. Together with Audi, we then trained new ways of collaboration to increase pace and proof Vorsprung. We created a dedicated Agile Release Train consisting of five agile, cross-functional teams, delivering digital premium to Audiâ€™s 19 key markets.
